# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Objective

Write only the code â€” no explanations, comments, or output unless explicitly requested.

## Example

âŒ Incorrect:

```javascript
// This function adds two numbers
const add = (a, b) => {
  return a + b
}
```

âœ… Correct:

```javascript
const add = (a, b) => {
  return a + b
}
```
